DOC.brief_summary: Comparative study of efficacy and safety of ketamine, clonidine, mixture of both and placebo in patients with diabetic neuropathic pain
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus type I or II Mono or polyneuropathy Treatment with Tricyclic Antidepressant, Carbamazepine during 3 weeks at least Preserved cognition Ulcerative or infection or vesicle lesion in pain site Pregnancy Breast feeding
